amendment.description: To restore funding for vocational education to the fiscal year 2003 level for fiscal years 2004 through 2013.

vote.text: Amendment SA 424 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 98.

action.text: Amendment SA 424 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S4362-4363; text: CR S4362-4363) To restore funding for vocational education to the fiscal year 2003 level for fiscal years 2004 through 2013.
